zapaddon.name: Forced Browse
zapaddon.description: Forced browsing of files and directories using code from the OWASP DirBuster tool
zapaddon.author: ZAP Dev Team
zapaddon.changes:
Removed DirBuster's GUI code, it's controlled with ZAP's GUI.
Unload all components during uninstallation (Issue 1505).
Updated for ZAP 2.4
